::Magmatron::

    "Zardus, you have my full attention," He said. "What do =
you want us to do? [To the ship and all Destrons] We are attacking Hell Bea=
st."

::Destrons::

    They all went to the gun room and got some powerful=
 weapons. Dachande loaded up and went to the front. Battera did the same. T=
he Nightmares did and got ready for full on combat. Praetorian got ready, a=
s well as Jynx.

::Vukodlak::

    His time of awakening was coming close. =
He would destroy what ever was left of the Autobots and the Decepticons.
  =
  
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 19, 2001 10:55 PM
  Subject: Re: A=
lliance Proposal


  ::Killfest/Zardus/FZ/Bloodystrike::

  Killfest enters=
 the conference room in time to hear DrillBit and 
  Darkfate talking about=
 the Alliance's proposal. He nods.

  "Yes, I would enjoy a chance at battl=
e against Hell Beast," he says, 
  waiting for Zardus to reply to DarkFate.=

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardus taps a few buttons, making =
the channel that he and Darkfate 
  were on secure.

  "My scanners detect =
only two of his Predacons in your area," he says 
  to Darkfate, "I have a =
potential mutiny in my base, so I don't know 
  if I can send troops."

  H=
e frowns, noticing something on the scanner reports of the CF. 
  Unitron's=
 signature was there, but Unitron was also in the base..

  "I have to go f=
or a few moments," he says to Darkfate, "There's 
  something I need to tak=
e care of."

  He closes the channel and turns to FZ.

  "Go to the CF and =
oversee that everything is going fine. There's 
  something up."

  FZ nods=
, turning around and walking out of the bridge. He exits the 
  Iron Fist a=
nd blasts off, heading toward the CF at top speed.

  Zardus turns back in =
his chair, remembering something. The Destrons! 
  They were allies of the =
Alliance as well..

  "Zardus to Magmatron," he says into his comm, opening=
 a channel to 
  Magmatron, "My troops are currently attacking Hell Beast's=
 base. If 
  you could aid us there, or perhaps attack his troops at the 
 =
 Cybertronian Fire, it would be greatly appreciated and repaid. I 
  await =
your answer."

  He closes the channel, sending a transmission to Darkfate =
again. "I'm 
  sending a bot to help you out. That's all I can muster at th=
e moment 
  though."

  He taps a few buttons, sending Bloodystrike an orde=
r.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike sighs, changing cours=
e half-way to the Alliance base and 
  heading for the Black Fortress inste=
ad.

aying Smackdown! 2 quite a bit on the ol' playstation)

ockwave/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Unicron/The Protectobots:

  loo=
king at 
  > the sun as the solar technology in them absorbed great amounts=
 of 
  energy, his 
  > overall power level back up to 65% again.  
  > 
  =
> He stood, firing off a wide blast of optic energy, intercepting 
  three =
charges 
  > heading for Sun Crusher.  Twenty five blasts struck Vehement's=
 
  armor, not 
  > penetrating it or even coming close to it.
  > 
  > The=
 ginormous robot stretched an arm with a sick smile.  His left 
  arm 
  > =
transformed into a wide cannon as a eight foot long broadsword 
  appeared =
in 
  > his right hand.
  > 
  > Raising the cannon of an arm, he launching=
 two energy-signature 
  seeking 
  > missiles at Iron Raptor's abdomen.
  =
> 
  > Moving the point of the broadsword to point at Condor, a fire ball 
=
  errupting 
  > from it at the enemy's chest.
  > 
  > ---
  > 
  > Reflec=
tor felt a surge of power, that told him Unicron was 
  siphoning more 
  >=
 power to him.  Getting up and ignoring the pain as twenty-three 
  shots d=
ug 
  > into his body, he raised an arm, launching two missile at IRIS from=
 
  his wrist 
  > cannon.
  > 
  > ---
  > 
  > Sun Crusher rolled to the =
left, the explosions from the charge 
  sending him 
  > flipping through t=
he air, slamming painfully to his legs, almost 
  causing him 
  > to crash=
 to the ground.  "That's it, heathens," he said, spitting 
  mech-fluid 
  =
> into the burnt grass before him, "you want to die painfully, be my 
  gue=
st."
  > 
  > With that, his shaped twisted into the form of a tank, Sun Cr=
usher 
  the hover 
  > tank bringing a long barrel to point at the CF, lau=
nching three 
  explosive 
  > shells from the bowels of the tank.
  > 
  >=
 ---
  > 
  > Unicron, still disguised as Unitron, activated a comm. link t=
o all 
  Alliance 
  > members at the scene of the Cybertronian Fire.  
  >=
 
  > "All Alliance warriors, this is Unitron," his voice sounding 
  exact=
ly like 
  > Unitron's, his appearance the same as well, "I received orders=
 from 
  Zardus, 
  > leave everyone alone and focus solely on crippling th=
e Cybertronian 
  Fire 
  > beyond repair.  Then make a full retreat."
  > =

  > =3D=3D=3D
  > 
  > Shockwave was flying at his top speed for atmospher=
ic conditions in 
  his space 
  > fighter mode, arming all his weapons.  T=
he cause would not fall.
  > 
  > =3D=3D=3D
  > 
  > Hot Spot looked at two=
 CR chambers, noticing First Aid and Blades 
  were still 
  > badly damage=
d.  He then looked over to Groove and Streetwise.
  > 
  > "Blades is close=
r to being repaired.  I will stay here and have him 
  go out to 
  > help =
you while you attack the enemies outside.
  > 
  > Groove and Streetwise no=
dded, runinng as fast as they could for 
  their nearest 
  > exit out of t=
he ship that wasn't a large hole in the ship.
